body:
Toggles a `du-open` class on the parent of the target element. Actual dropdown behavior can then be controlled by CSS. Example usage: ```html DownUp Example
  • Main Item 1
  • Main Item 2
  • Main Item 3
  • More Info
    • Hidden Item 1
    • Hidden Item 2
    • Hidden Item 3
``` TODO: create example page
tagline: A simple jQuery plugin to toggle dropdown menus on a page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: downup.js
